special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
If a card would be put into an opponent’s graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
[b]2 Defense[/b] Stage 2
When this Expedition reaches stage 2, exile all creatures that didn’t deal damage to it this turn.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
When Into Ysterid is defeated, return a creature card exiled with it to the battlefield under your control.
